description.0: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

0.0: CRIT Hits have a <cryo>60%</cryo> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <cryo>12</cryo>s.

1.0: CRIT Hits have a <cryo>70%</cryo> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <cryo>10.5</cryo>s.

2.0: CRIT Hits have a <cryo>80%</cryo> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <cryo>9</cryo>s.

3.0: CRIT Hits have a <cryo>90%</cryo> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <cryo>7.5</cryo>s.

4.0: CRIT Hits have a <cryo>100%</cryo> chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every <cryo>6</cryo>s.
